runs.task_description: Implement a simple calculator module in the target file. Create a Calculator class with methods add(a: float, b: float) -> float, subtract(a: float, b: float) -> float, multiply(a: float, b: float) -> float, and divide(a: float, b: float) -> float. The divide method must handle division by zero gracefully by raising a ValueError with a clear error message. Include concise docstrings for all methods and avoid any I/O or CLI code; this module is purely a reusable library.

agent_input.goal: Generate a reusable Calculator class with basic arithmetic operations in the target file, BUT this profile is intentionally configured to introduce at least one Python syntax error for retry testing.
